name: PiConnect
description: PiConnect aims to solve the existing limitations of the Pi Network. Currently, transactions must be completed manually in order to trade Pi and to prove to be a barrier that is stopping many users from being able to trade their Pi coins. The application provides safe exchange to trade their coins, receive real time updates on prices and exchange rates between Picoin and other mainstream coins. PiConnect users will be able to conveniently trade Pi anytime and anywhere with ensured security and low fees.
